item.title: Investment Management System
item.description: This web application is made by keeping in mind the needs of Mutual Fund Distributors as they are the primary consumers of the application. The distributors can keep a track of the funds allocated to their clients. They can visualize investors assets through dashboard. MF Distributor can perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on their Investors and their Funds Allocated. They get the Live NAV (Net Asset Value) directly from the AMFI India Website

item.title: Vehicle Traffic Analysis and Analytics System
item.description: In this project vehicles are detected from a surveillance video camera and then classified into HMV, LMV and SMV using Python and OpenCV API. YOLO algorithm is used for real time object detection. Vehicle data is stored in a MySQL database. Analytics Dashboard is built using Flask and Google Charts are used to render graphs. Technologies Used - Python Flask OpenCV Google Charts

item.title: About
item.description: Hey There! I am Aditya Bagad, Welcome to my small space on the web. I hold a degree in B.E. Computer Science and Iâ€™m currently working as a Data Engineer Intern. I love to code and I code primarily in Python language. I am extremely passionate about solving problems and this passion of mine has driven me towards exploring and building full stack python web/data applications. I’m interested in Big Data Technologoes and DevOps.

item.title: Git Commands
item.description: git clone «repo» - This command clones a remote repository onto your local machine. E.g.git clone https://github.com/AdityaBagad/Password-Strength-Analysis.git - Password Strength Analysis repository is cloned to your local machine. git add «files/directory» - This command is used to save most recent changes to staging area so that they can be tracked. E.g.git add hello.txt - This command will add hello.txt file to the staging area. E.g.git add --all - This command will add files in the current directory.
